text: The men's 3 × 1000 metres relay event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 10 March in Madrid. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Mikhail Zhelobovskiy Oleg Rayko Anatoliy Verlan || 7:13.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Alberto Estebán Enrique Bondia Virgilio González || 7:23.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Pavel Hruška Ján Kasal Miroslav Jůza || 7:40.2 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Men's 3 × 1000 metres relay
